Articles.Content: Thanks for making this mod, stock root selection tool/app/whatever is awful.

Hey everybody,

This mod looks amazing!

I've downloaded it, copied the folder Gamedata/SelectRoot2 to KSP/Game/Gamedata ("NASAmission" and "Squad" are also in tha folder).

But somehow it doesn't works. I still have version 23.5.

Please help me!

I still have version 23.5.

This is probably your problem. Did you simply download from the first link in the OP? If so, that's not the version you want. The version you ant/need is found within the spoiler there, at the end of the OP. (All older versions are located there.)

Does this work in 1.0.5?

Can you get CKAN updated for it?

Thx

LGG
Don't seem to work properly in 1.05. The root assignment function stays unchanged from stock.

[quote name='Galenmacil']Don't seem to work properly in 1.05. The root assignment function stays unchanged from stock.[/QUOTE]

More information: What version are you running? Any log files?

[quote name='linuxgurugamer']More information: What version are you running? Any log files?[/QUOTE]

Am sorry false alarm! I don't know exactly what I did wrong yesterday but now the mod work as expected. Sorry again...

For all,

Since the original author seems to not be around, I'm going to be taking this mod and combining it with the EditorExtensions mod (whose author also is gone), and will be releasing them in a few days as a new mod.  Not sure of the name yet, will post when it's available

I use both selectroot 2 and EEX . Nice to know you will develop it further! Cool!

EEX2 may be?

Edited December 9, 2015 by evileye.x

14 minutes ago, evileye.x said:

I use both selectroot 2 and EEX . Nice to know you will develop it further! Cool!

EEX2 may be?

Probably EditorExtensionsRedux

Edited December 9, 2015 by linuxgurugamer

I've signed up specifically to express my thanks for this great mod - thank you so much for the work that both you and all the wonderful modders put in, to non-coders such as myself your work is frankly invaluable.
